attributes.action: arrange for the government make small business loans available directly to small business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My thoughts are British Government lent directly to the city, subsidised the motor-trade with an allowance to scrap (many built outside the EU) cars, Government took the taxpayers money directly to the banks — why can’t the Government make [small-business loans] available directly to small business owners?

I'm astonished how many people are still being directly affected by the snow... The 'up-to-the-knees' snow has been gone for weeks ... businesss still slow to get going this year...' and 'we're seeing companies in the S.M.E sector off to a slow start and some even calling in the liquidator.'

Well, it's not good enough!!! ... Many business owners have been to the banks and been refused! Banks are calling in overdrafts from sole traders with perfect credit ratings and looking to expand....
